dcterms:creator: J. Salamon
C. Jacoby
J. P. Bello
dcterms:description: A publicly available dataset for sound event detection in urban environments, accompanied by detailed annotations including onset and offset times for each sound event, along with human-generated accurate annotations.
dcterms:title: URBAN-SED

dcterms:creator: J. Huh
J. Chalk
E. Kazakos
D. Damen
A. Zisserman
dcterms:description: A large-scale dataset consisting of over 36,000 audio recordings of various lengths, totaling over 500 hours of audio, made in a variety of indoor and outdoor environments, covering a wide range of sound classes including human speech, animal sounds, environmental sounds, and music.
dcterms:title: EPIC-Sounds
